alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 7:17PM CST until February 13 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Low lying pastures will flood. Cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:05 PM CST Friday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:05 PM CST Friday was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 13.7 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
